name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App Title Extractor for Google Play

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts app titles from the Google Play Store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The App Title Extractor for Google Play is a simple yet powerful tool designed to help users effortlessly gather app titles from the Google Play Store. Ideal for researchers, app developers, digital marketers, or anyone needing to track or analyze app listings, this extension saves time by automating the process of collecting app names.

With a single click, you can quickly extract and view app titles directly in the extensionâ€™s popup window. This streamlined process helps avoid tedious manual copying, making it easier to keep track of multiple apps or quickly capture titles for research purposes.

Whether you're conducting market research, tracking competitor apps, or simply organizing a list of interesting apps, the App Title Extractor is here to enhance your productivity. Install it today to take control of your app research with ease and efficiency!
